job_description:
• Must be able to pass a Motor Vehicle Record (MVR) including a background check, and an onsite Vehicle Operator testing examination with or Sr.
• Driver highly preferred to have Level 1,2,3,4 Performance Driver Training qualifications from an accredited Driver Training Facility, and or Proving Ground.
• Vehicle Operators highly preferred to have Middle Class Plus Training from the Toyota Arizona Proving Ground or equivalent is a plus.
• Must have a valid driver's license in the state of residence that you will be driving/operating a vehicle Have good command of the English language with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
• An Associate degree with an emphasis in Automotive or related field a Plus.
• Knowledge/experience with Atlassian Software (Jira, Confluence) is a plus.
• No drug or alcohol related driving incidents in the last 3 years No more than 1 serious moving violation in the last 3 years High School Diploma or equivalent education.

• Hardware Engineer II Locations Fort Washington, PA, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date09/26/2025 Be the First to Apply As a Hardware Engineer II here at Honeywell, you will contribute to hardware design from concept to production, collaborate on requirements, design complex systems, perform testing, and support junior engineers.
• You will be integral in creating system solutions that meet the evolving needs of our customers.
• Systems Engineering - Recent Grad/Full Time Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending As a Recent Graduate here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to kickstart your career by working alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and innovative environment.
• Systems Engineering - Recent Grad/Full Time (US Person Required) Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending As a Recent Graduate here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to kickstart your career by working alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and innovative environment.
• Traveling HVAC Controls - Lead Field Service Technician Locations Des Plaines, IL, United States Posting Date09/10/2025 Be the First to Apply Honeywell is seeking a talented Lead Service Tech with experience in commissioning HVAC controls in commercial buildings.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet engineering support requirements.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet engineering support requirements.
• You will contribute to the design, development, and implementation of cutting-edge technology that meets the evolving needs of our customers.
